metadata.name: 𝐒𝐨𝐧 𝐨𝐟 𝐋𝐨𝐯𝐞
metadata.description:
As the cycle of life spun into motion 
the opposites united in a dance of ecstatic procreation.

Like long lost lovers they celebrated each other 
while the time stood still and gazed in wonder.

Molten rivers of passion caressed the barren lands 
as the beaming Moon clasped the Glorious Sun’s Hands.

And then the serpent slowly slithers out of its skin, 
guiding the spirit into the new world order within.

The creatures of the night hum a lullaby 
and take the new born Son of Love onto a Eternal Flight. 

—————————————————————————————————

Hand Drawn
Digitally Recreated in Photoshop
Content: Prashant Menon
Specs 3474 x 4680 px
